member.name: T:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordion
member.summary: An accordion is a vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each contain a title, content snippet, or thumbnail representing a section of content. The headings function as controls that enable users to reveal or hide their associated sections of content. Accordions are commonly used to reduce the need to scroll when presenting multiple sections of content on a single page.

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordion.ExpandMode
member.summary: Controls the expand mode of the Accordion, either allowing single or multiple item expansion.

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordion.ChildContent
member.summary: The slot for the accordion items

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordion.OnChange
member.summary: Fires a event callback with `AdaptiveAccordionItem` as parameter when the active item changes

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordionItem.HeadingLevel
member.summary: Configures the aria level of the heading element.

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordionItem.HeadingSlot
member.summary: Content which serves as the accordion item heading and text of the expand button

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordionItem.StartSlot
member.summary: Content which can be provided between the heading and the icon

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordionItem.EndSlot
member.summary: Content which can be provided between the start slot and icon

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordionItem.ExpandedIconSlot
member.summary: The expanded icon Warning: currently there seems to be bug in awc implementation, as slot is not rendered correctly

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveAccordionItem.CollapsedIconSlot
member.summary: The collapsed icon Warning: currently there seems to be bug in awc implementation, as slot is not rendered correctly

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveComponentBase.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier. The value will be used as the HTML global id attribute.

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveComponentBase.Class
member.summary: Optional CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveComponentBase.Style
member.summary: Optional in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.

member.name: P:AdaptiveBlazor.Components.AdaptiveComponentBase.AdditionalAttributes
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of additional attributes that will be applied to the created element.
